name: Sliding Sleighs
description:
Sliding Sleigh's is your dream of sliding with Santa.

Do you dream that Santa will take you for a ride? Of course it's not a ride, it’s a slide and your dream came true with Sliding Sleighs...

Great graphics, cute characters, cool theme and the smiling Santa will make a more fun and cheerful Christmas!

A Christmas themed game containing bags of fun and enjoyment, which will keep you playing for long hours.

Reach Santa's House as fast as you can.

A completely fun and entertaining game.

Game features:

- 25 Challenging levels
- Race against time
- 5 Air Tricks for additional points
- Gather as many Snowflakes for additional points
- Choose from 10 different Christmas themed characters (Gingerbread, Mrs. Claus, Elf, Reindeer,Snowman, Polar bear, Christmas Tree, Babies and Stockings)
- Power boosts to help you get through that challenging level
- Level Skips - When you just can't get past that one level
- Amazing Background music and sound effects when you climb high.


To pick up speed, simply press and hold your finger on the screen when going downhill and release when going uphill. Sounds easy, but there is definitely a strategy required in order to make it down in the allotted time.
